title: 7 Hard Truths About Making Your Dreams Come True EP 1226
description:
https://lewishowes.com/abundance2022 - Join My FREE 5 DAY ABUNDANCE CHALLENGE Starting On 2/14/22

For today’s episode, I wanted to give you all a little “tough love.” We’re going to discuss the 7 hard truths about making your dreams come true. These truths come from the themes and patterns I’ve gathered from countless conversations with some of the world’s top athletes, bestselling authors, billionaires, investors, and more.

I’m calling them “hard truths” because over the years, I’ve found that not everyone is ready to hear these things. Some might be putting off a certain truth, or avoiding it altogether thinking there’s a way around it. I can’t speak for everyone in the world, but I’ve found that realizing and accepting these 7 is absolutely essential to achieving your dreams and reaching your full potential.

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1226

Daymond John on How to Close any Deal and Achieve Any Outcome: https://link.chtbl.com/928-pod

Sara Blakely on Writing Your Billion Dollar Story: https://link.chtbl.com/893-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
